name: VITO
title: RESUME
desc: I'm Vito, a UI Designer with 5+ years of experience. I create visually appealing interfaces for web and mobile apps. Proficient in Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I enjoy collaborating with others to create high-quality products.

list.content: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, University of California, Los Angeles
Associate of Arts in Graphic Design, San Francisco State University
High School Diploma, Lincoln High School

list: Best in Show Award, National Advertising Awards, 2020
